aaquake2 - Text Mode Quake II
What? Just what you heard - text mode Quake II.
Why? Why not? You can watch TV in text mode, you can play DVDs in text mode, you can play Quake 1 in text mode. Quake II is the logical next step.
Or, as the author of ttyquake put it, "If you have to ask why, you're not a member of the intended audience."
